name: Facebook Stickers Remover
description:
Use this to get rid of Facebook Stickers you don't want anymore.
Facebook omitted to add a "remove" button, so this could be useful until it gets done.
additional_info:
This style removes ALL the stickers, so if you wanna keep some stickers, you can edit the CSS code by 3 ways:
1-Comment (/* before the code line and */ after the code line) the code lines of the stickers you wanna keep.
2-Remove completely the code lines of the stickers you wanna keep.
3-Remove the attribute "!important" that's at the end of the code line of the stickers you wanna keep.
